availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, enslaved man. Resident in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Enslaved by Mary A. J. Cartwright in 1850. Resident of Caldwell County in 1860. Enslaved by Mary A. J. Cartwright Wadlington and Thomas B. Wadlington in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 778.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 221B-222A.
KYR-001-020-0001.
KYR-001-020-0074.
